heroDesc: Full-stack developer developing modern and high-performance web applications.
experienceIntro: Selected titles from projects where I took end-to-end responsibility in real products.
aboutText: I am a Full Stack Developer experienced in developing end-to-end web applications with Java Spring Boot and React, working on systems based on RESTful API, JWT-based authentication, and PostgreSQL. I have taken part in projects actively used university-wide; I focus on scalability, clean architecture, and sustainable code principles.

experiences.title: Intern
details: Taking an active role in RESTful API development processes using Java and Spring Boot.
Developing component-based and responsive pages with modern interface design using React.
Working on creating sustainable backend structures with layered architecture (Controller, Service, Repository).

experiences.title: Intern
details: Took part in AI bot development processes based on Natural Language Processing (NLP).
Developed text processing pipelines using Python and related libraries (TensorFlow, NLTK, Hugging Face).
Designed and tested REST API endpoints for backend integrations.
Contributed to building a scalable and reliable API structure by integrating AI models with backend architecture.

experiences.title: Intern
details: Participated in the training and internship program on Google's game and application development processes.
Had the opportunity to learn and apply software development processes.
Took part in projects using Google's technological infrastructure.
